thread.title: Chris Evans Freaked Out Over Patriots' Super Bowl Win & There's Video Proof!
thread.title_full: Chris Evans Freaked Out Over Patriots' Super Bowl Win & There's Video Proof!

author: Just Jared
title: Chris Evans Freaked Out Over Patriots' Super Bowl Win & There's Video Proof!
text:
Chris Evans was in the crowd at the 2017 Super Bowl and he absolutely freaked out when his hometown team, the New England Patriots, pulled off a win in overtime.
The 35-year-old actor was joined in the stands by his Avengers co-star Jeremy Renner , among others. 
“I definitely kept my cool when we scored in OT to win the game,” he captioned the below video on Twitter.
After the game ended on Sunday night, Chris tweeted , “OH MY GOD GREATEST SPORTING EVENT OF MY ENTIRE LIFE!!!! CONGRATULATIONS NEW ENGLAD PATRIOTS!!!!”
I definitely kept my cool when we scored in OT to win the game @thescottevans @Renner4Real @LOZOg @peck_j pic.twitter.com/2LXfcgx8dE 
— Chris Evans (@ChrisEvans) February 6, 2017
